# [Interview #1084: Ask the Author: Brandon Sanderson, Entry #13](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1084#13)

#### Question

What is the next project you will be adding to the progress bar on your site?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I'm going to hop back to
*Shadows of Self*
, I think.
